panels.description: Gives an overview of the current status of the Galaxy job queue.

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'running') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'running') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'running') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Job queue - current status

panels.description: Time-series showing the status of Galaxy jobs.

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'running') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'queued') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "queue-overview" WHERE ("state" = 'new') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

panels.title: Job queue

panels.description: Shows the number of jobs handled by each job handler. Each job handler is run as a systemd service.
panels.title: Jobs per handler - Overview

panels.description: Shows the distribution of jobs in the queued state, categorized as processed and unprocessed depending on whether they have received an external  (HTCondor) ID or not.
panels.title: Queued jobs (with or without condor ids) - current status

panels.description: Shows the distribution of jobs in the queued state, categorized as processed and unprocessed depending on whether they have received an external  (HTCondor) ID or not.
panels.title: Queued jobs (with or without condor ids)

panels.description: Gives an overview of the number of running and queued jobs per destination.
panels.title: Jobs per destination - Overview

panels.description: Shows the storage overview of Galaxy JWD's.
panels.title: Galaxy JWDs - Overview

panels.description: Shows the number of currently active users who are logged in on the usegalaxy.eu website.

targets.query: SELECT "users" FROM "active_users" WHERE ("host" = 'sn06.galaxyproject.eu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "timespan"

panels.title: Active Users (10 minutes)

panels.description: Shows the number of seconds since the last log entry. If the entry was a bit old then the respective handler might have some issues. So, this helps to investigate the corresponding handler. Each handler is run as a systemd service.
panels.title: Gunicorn handlers last log entry

panels.description: This panel shows the list of services (e.g., tusd, celery, Galaxy, rabbitmq, etc.) and their statuses.
panels.title: (WIP) Status of all critical services

panels.description: Gives an overview of the current status of the jobs in the HTCondor queue.
panels.title: HTCondor job queue - overview

panels.description: Gives an overview of the current status of the jobs in the HTCondor queue.

targets.query: SELECT mean("count") FROM "cluster.queue" WHERE ("host" = 'maintenance.galaxyproject.eu' AND "schedd" = 'sn06.galaxyproject.eu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state"

panels.title: HTCondor job queue - overview

panels.description: Shows the resource utilization of the entire HTCondor  cluster utilization by Galaxy
panels.title: Galaxy utilization of HTCondor cluster - Overview

panels.description:
This panel shows the real-time information of the condor queue. It also shows the compute resources requested by the job, when it was submitted to the queue, and when it started. 

Note:
1. *undefined => The respective data was unavailable because the job had not yet started or was on hold or idle.
2. Sometimes, request memory could be more than defined for the tool in the TPV tools.yml or the TPV shared database because we have a dedicated script that resubmits the job if it needs more memory up to a certain number of times.
panels.title: Condor queued jobs and their status

panels.description: Shows the dynamic slots distribution across different groups (only important groups are shown). This gives an idea of what slots are available and free.
panels.title: HTCondor cluster slots per group

panels.description: Shows the resource utilization of the HTCondor cluster GalaxyGroup Compute.
panels.title: HTCondor cluster resource utilization of GalaxyGroup Compute

panels.description: Shows the resource utilization of the HTCondor cluster GalaxyGroup Compute GPU
panels.title: HTCondor cluster resource utilization of GalaxyGroup Compute GPU

panels.description: Shows the resource utilization of the HTCondor cluster GalaxyGroup Interactive
panels.title: HTCondor cluster resource utilization of GalaxyGroup Interactive

panels.description: Shows the resource utilization of the HTCondor cluster GalaxyGroup Upload
panels.title: HTCondor cluster resource utilization of GalaxyGroup Upload

panels.description: Shows the count of the ones that are present in each zone (HTCondor cluster, BWCloud and the resources.yaml in VGCN infrastructure repo).

targets.query: SELECT count(htcondor) AS "HTCondor" from vgcn_monitoring WHERE time >= now() - 30m and time <= now() and htcondor=true
SELECT count(bwcloud) AS "BWCloud" from vgcn_monitoring WHERE time >= now() - 30m and time <= now() and bwcloud=true
SELECT count(resource_def) AS "VGCN definition" from vgcn_monitoring WHERE time >= now() - 30m and time <= now() and resource_def=true

panels.title: Active nodes

panels.description: Shows the root file system usage of Galaxy's BWCloud VMs (service and worker VMs) and servers.

targets.query: SELECT d1.host AS Hosts, d1.path AS "Root file system", d1.used_percent AS "Used percentage" FROM disk AS d1 WHERE d1.path = '/'

panels.title: BWCloud VMs and Servers root FS ('/') usage

panels.description: Shows the sn06's (Galaxy master node) current disk usage

targets.query: SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "fstype", "path" fill(none)

panels.title: Current Disk Usage

panels.description: Shows the sn06's (Galaxy master node) CPU utilization
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Shows the sn06's (Galaxy master node) memory usage
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Shows the sn06's (Galaxy master node) 1, 5, and 15 minute load average
panels.title: Server load

panels.description: Shows the sn06's (Galaxy master node) current disk IO
panels.title: IO Time

panels.description:
Shows the current status of the respective build jobs. 

Note: The user viewing this panel should have at least read access to the respective build jobs to view the actual status and should have logged in to the Jenkins UI.

panels.title: Build status

list.definition: SELECT last("total")  / (1024*1024*1024*1024) FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'sn06.galaxyproject.eu' AND "device" =~ /^.*jwd*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"
list.name: jwd_max
list.query: SELECT last("total")  / (1024*1024*1024*1024) FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" = 'sn06.galaxyproject.eu' AND "device" =~ /^.*jwd*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster.queue" WITH KEY = "schedd"
list.name: Schedd
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cluster.queue" WITH KEY = "schedd"
